card.name: [OP] Eustass"Captain"Kid [ST02-001]
card.text: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] ③ (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your cost area.) You may trash 1 card from your hand: Set this Leader as active.

card.name: [OP] Urouge [ST02-003]
card.text: [DON!! x1] If you have 3 or more Characters, this card gains +2000 power.

card.name: [OP] Capone"Gang"Bege [ST02-004]
card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

card.name: [OP] Killer [ST02-005]
card.text: [On Play] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less. [Trigger] Play this card.

card.name: [OP] Jewelry Bonney [ST02-007]
card.text: [Activate: Main] ➀ (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your cost area.) You may rest this Character: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Supernovas} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: [OP] Scratchmen Apoo [ST02-008]
card.text: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's DON!! cards.

card.name: [OP] Trafalgar Law [ST02-009]
card.text: [On Play] Set up to 1 of your {Supernovas} or {Heart Pirates} type rested Characters with a cost of 5 or less as active.

card.name: [OP] Basil Hawkins [ST02-010]
card.text: [DON!! x1] [Once Per Turn] [Your Turn] If this Character battles your opponent's Character, set this card as active.

card.name: [OP] Eustass"Captain"Kid [ST02-013]
card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) [DON!! x1] [End of Your Turn] Set this card as active.

card.name: [OP] X.Drake [ST02-014]
card.text: [DON!! x1] [Your Turn] If this Character is rested, your {Supernovas} or {Navy} type Leaders and Characters gain +1000 power.

card.name: [OP] Scalpel [ST02-015]
card.text: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active. [Trigger] Set up to 2 of your DON!! cards as active.

card.name: [OP] Repel [ST02-016]
card.text: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active.

card.name: [OP] Straw Sword [ST02-017]
card.text: [Main] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters. [Trigger] Play up to 1 {Supernovas} type card with a cost of 2 or less from your hand.
